Advisory.Description: Square Retrofit versions from (including) 2.0 to 2.5.0 (excluding) contain a Directory Traversal vulnerability in RequestBuilder class, method addPathParameter. By manipulating the URL an attacker could add or delete resources otherwise unavailable to her. This attack appears to be exploitable via an encoded path parameter on POST, PUT or DELETE request. This vulnerability appears to have been fixed in 2.5.0 and later.
Advisory.Summary: Moderate severity vulnerability that affects com.squareup.retrofit2:retrofit
